issue.title: [IR] API for providing a catalog to Arrow compute
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14394](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14394). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Compute IR producers and consumers need a way to consume metadata from some kind of catalog to get answers to questions like "What tables can I query?", "What is the schema of table `X`?", and others.

This JIRA is for tracking the work of creating this interface.

`[~bkietz]`
`[~kszucs]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14394?focusedCommentId=17607888) by @toddfarmer:*
The Compute IR component has been abandoned in favor of Substrait. Please see [here](https://lists.apache.org/thread/o9vf5fzkkpjzxqsw2bd5b6grh9ov8ys2) for details on engaging with the Substrait project.
